drow.gui

Class DrowGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • drow.gui.DrowGui

  • public class DrowGui
extends java.lang.Object

    DrowGui

    This class controls the GUI and JTabbedPane.

    Author:
    Simon O'Neill, Graham Wolfe

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrowGui

        public DrowGui(DocumentView documentView,
               javax.swing.JTabbedPane tabbedPane)

        Constructor

        This constructor sets the JFrame title and icon image, It also sets the document view layout to null so we can position the document with absolute coordinates.
        Parameters:
        documentView - - The view containing the document.
        tabbedPane - - The JTabbedPane containing the panels.
